Keywords: Fantastic Four
Real Name: Susan Richards
Team Up
1
TEAM-UP: 3 OR MORE SIDEKICKS: If your force has 3 or more Sidekicks, friendly Captains and Sidekicks have Passenger: 1. If they already have Passenger: 1 (such as from Wing symbol), they have Passenger: 2 instead.
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Captain
I CONSIDER THEM ALL MY CHILDREN: Once per turn, when a friendly Sidekick is targeted by an attack, you may replace that Sidekick's defense value with Invisible Woman's printed defense value.

Goop
Definitely takes a hit under the new rules not being able to push to click 2. Much more viable on her lower line for cheap 18defend and tk.
March 2, 2021
nlegore
Push? Goop, what are you talking about? I don't know what this "push" is, but it sounds nice... the option to over exert a figure and then take a Clix of damage by choice... that almost sounds like some kind of stragety... Well you have the wrong game if you are looking for stragety...
February 25, 2021
Jarosa
There are better options to play Invisible Woman. Most sidekicks have a 16 defense so her option to share 18 or possibly 19 is pretty sweet. If you are playing sidekicks she is an OK support piece. She does bring TK top dial and defend in addition to her trait. Later dial PC and Barrier will be useful. There are better Invisible Woman options.
February 23, 2021
jdm61802
I have to completely agree. Given a sidekick a 19 defense when wanted would be nice; not that the 18 is bad; but in effort to make folks not ‘feel bad’, that option is now eliminated. The lose of that potential kind of makes me feel bad. ��
February 20, 2021
KillerKing
I dunno what to think of her. She brings too little for 60 points and have to push her to at least have a good defend or for protecting your sidekicks. She is gonna be even less useful when the new rules hit since there won't be pushing damage anymore.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Push her to that second click to get the 19defend protecting your team. If they knock her off it they have to deal with barrier and prob. So an expensive support piece but a good one. She is a MUST though for a sidekick team. Probably better at second line for 40pts.
